body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Raymond Wilson and I represent Peak Resorts. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Martha. To assist you further, could you please provide me with the first three digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Now, may I also have the month you were born in?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Martha. Is there anything else you would like to add or discuss?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think that covers it. I'm just concerned about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Martha. Thank you for raising it. We take privacy seriously and will do our best to address it. Thank you for your time today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome. Have a great day! Goodbye.
